price: 1 Tâ-Sîn. Voici les versets du Coran, livre parfaitement clair,
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
